verses.text_uthmani: الٓر ۚ تِلْكَ ءَايَـٰتُ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ وَقُرْءَانٍ مُّبِينٍ

translations.text: Alif-Lãm-Ra. These are the verses of the Book; the clear Quran.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Alif-lam-ra tilka ayatualkitabi waqur-anin mubeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: رُّبَمَا يَوَدُّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ لَوْ كَانُوا۟ مُسْلِمِينَ

translations.text: ˹The day will come when˺ the disbelievers will certainly wish they had submitted ˹to Allah˺.<sup foot_note=76826>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Rubama yawaddu allatheenakafaroo law kanoo muslimeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ذَرْهُمْ يَأْكُلُوا۟ وَيَتَمَتَّعُوا۟ وَيُلْهِهِمُ ٱلْأَمَلُ ۖ فَسَوْفَ يَعْلَمُونَ

translations.text: ˹So˺ let them eat and enjoy themselves and be diverted by ˹false˺ hope, for they will soon know.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Tharhum ya/kuloo wayatamattaAAoowayulhihimu al-amalu fasawfa yaAAlamoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَمَآ أَهْلَكْنَا مِن قَرْيَةٍ إِلَّا وَلَهَا كِتَابٌ مَّعْلُومٌ

translations.text: We have never destroyed a society without a destined term.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wama ahlakna min qaryatin illawalaha kitabun maAAloom
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: مَّا تَسْبِقُ مِنْ أُمَّةٍ أَجَلَهَا وَمَا يَسْتَـْٔخِرُونَ

translations.text: No people can advance their doom, nor can they delay it.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ma tasbiqu min ommatin ajalahawama yasta/khiroon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَقَالُوا۟ يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِى نُزِّلَ عَلَيْهِ ٱلذِّكْرُ إِنَّكَ لَمَجْنُونٌ

translations.text: They say, “O you to whom the Reminder<sup foot_note=76827>1</sup> is revealed! You must be insane!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waqaloo ya ayyuha allatheenuzzila AAalayhi aththikru innaka lamajnoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: لَّوْ مَا تَأْتِينَا بِٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةِ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّـٰدِقِينَ

translations.text: Why do you not bring us the angels, if what you say is true?”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Law ma ta/teena bilmala-ikatiin kunta mina assadiqeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: مَا نُنَزِّلُ ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةَ إِلَّا بِٱلْحَقِّ وَمَا كَانُوٓا۟ إِذًا مُّنظَرِينَ

translations.text: We do not send the angels down except for a just cause, and then ˹the end of˺ the disbelievers will not be delayed.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ma nunazzilu almala-ikata illabilhaqqi wama kanoo ithan munthareen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّا نَحْنُ نَزَّلْنَا ٱلذِّكْرَ وَإِنَّا لَهُۥ لَحَـٰفِظُونَ

translations.text: It is certainly We Who have revealed the Reminder, and it is certainly We Who will preserve it.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna nahnu nazzalna aththikrawa-inna lahu lahafithoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَقَدْ أَرْسَلْنَا مِن قَبْلِكَ فِى شِيَعِ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ

translations.text: Indeed, We sent messengers before you ˹O Prophet˺ among the groups of early peoples,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walaqad arsalna min qablika feeshiyaAAi al-awwaleen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَمَا يَأْتِيهِم مِّن رَّسُولٍ إِلَّا كَانُوا۟ بِهِۦ يَسْتَهْزِءُونَ

translations.text: but no messenger ever came to them without being mocked.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wama ya/teehim min rasoolin illakanoo bihi yastahzi-oon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: كَذَٰلِكَ نَسْلُكُهُۥ فِى قُلُوبِ ٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ

translations.text: This is how We allow disbelief ˹to steep˺ into the hearts of the wicked.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Kathalika naslukuhu fee quloobialmujrimeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ بِهِۦ ۖ وَقَدْ خَلَتْ سُنَّةُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ

translations.text: They would not believe in this ˹Quran˺ despite the ˹many˺ examples of those ˹destroyed˺ before.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: La yu/minoona bihi waqad khalatsunnatu al-awwaleen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَوْ فَتَحْنَا عَلَيْهِم بَابًا مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ فَظَلُّوا۟ فِيهِ يَعْرُجُونَ

translations.text: And even if We opened for them a gate to heaven, through which they continued to ascend,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walaw fatahna AAalayhim babanmina assama-i fathalloo feehiyaAArujoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: لَقَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّمَا سُكِّرَتْ أَبْصَـٰرُنَا بَلْ نَحْنُ قَوْمٌ مَّسْحُورُونَ

translations.text: still they would say, “Our eyes have truly been dazzled! In fact, we must have been bewitched.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Laqaloo innama sukkirat absarunabal nahnu qawmun mashooroon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَقَدْ جَعَلْنَا فِى ٱلسَّمَآءِ بُرُوجًا وَزَيَّنَّـٰهَا لِلنَّـٰظِرِينَ

translations.text: Indeed, We have placed constellations in the sky, and adorned it for all to see.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walaqad jaAAalna fee assama-iburoojan wazayyannaha linnathireen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَحَفِظْنَـٰهَا مِن كُلِّ شَيْطَـٰنٍ رَّجِيمٍ

translations.text: And We protected it from every accursed devil,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wahafithnahamin kulli shaytanin rajeem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِلَّا مَنِ ٱسْتَرَقَ ٱلسَّمْعَ فَأَتْبَعَهُۥ شِهَابٌ مُّبِينٌ

translations.text: except the one eavesdropping, who is then pursued by a visible flare.<sup foot_note=76828>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Illa mani istaraqa assamAAafaatbaAAahu shihabun mubeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱلْأَرْضَ مَدَدْنَـٰهَا وَأَلْقَيْنَا فِيهَا رَوَٰسِىَ وَأَنۢبَتْنَا فِيهَا مِن كُلِّ شَىْءٍ مَّوْزُونٍ

translations.text: As for the earth, We spread it out and placed upon it firm mountains, and caused everything to grow there in perfect balance.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wal-arda madadnahawaalqayna feeha rawasiya waanbatnafeeha min kulli shay-in mawzoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَجَعَلْنَا لَكُمْ فِيهَا مَعَـٰيِشَ وَمَن لَّسْتُمْ لَهُۥ بِرَٰزِقِينَ

translations.text: And We made in it means of sustenance for you and others, who you do not provide for.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: WajaAAalna lakum feeha maAAayishawaman lastum lahu biraziqeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَإِن مِّن شَىْءٍ إِلَّا عِندَنَا خَزَآئِنُهُۥ وَمَا نُنَزِّلُهُۥٓ إِلَّا بِقَدَرٍ مَّعْلُومٍ

translations.text: There is not any means ˹of sustenance˺ whose reserves We do not hold, only bringing it forth in precise measure.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wa-in min shay-in illa AAindanakhaza-inuhu wama nunazziluhu illa biqadarinmaAAloom
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَأَرْسَلْنَا ٱلرِّيَـٰحَ لَوَٰقِحَ فَأَنزَلْنَا مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءً فَأَسْقَيْنَـٰكُمُوهُ وَمَآ أَنتُمْ لَهُۥ بِخَـٰزِنِينَ

translation.text: and We gave it to you to drink

translations.text: We send fertilizing winds, and bring down rain from the sky for you to drink. It is not you who hold its reserves.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waarsalna arriyaha lawaqihafaanzalna mina assama-i maanfaasqaynakumoohu wama antum lahu bikhazineen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَإِنَّا لَنَحْنُ نُحْىِۦ وَنُمِيتُ وَنَحْنُ ٱلْوَٰرِثُونَ

translations.text: Surely it is We Who give life and cause death. And We are the ˹Eternal˺ Successor.<sup foot_note=76829>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wa-inna lanahnu nuhyeewanumeetu wanahnu alwarithoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَقَدْ عَلِمْنَا ٱلْمُسْتَقْدِمِينَ مِنكُمْ وَلَقَدْ عَلِمْنَا ٱلْمُسْتَـْٔخِرِينَ

translations.text: We certainly know those who have gone before you and those who will come after ˹you˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walaqad AAalimna almustaqdimeenaminkum walaqad AAalimna almusta/khireen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ يَحْشُرُهُمْ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ حَكِيمٌ عَلِيمٌ

translations.text: Surely your Lord ˹alone˺ will gather them together ˹for judgment˺. He is truly All-Wise, All-Knowing.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wa-inna rabbaka huwa yahshuruhuminnahu hakeemun AAaleem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ مِن صَلْصَـٰلٍ مِّنْ حَمَإٍ مَّسْنُونٍ

translations.text: Indeed, We created man from sounding clay moulded from black mud.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walaqad khalaqna al-insana minsalsalin min hama-in masnoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱلْجَآنَّ خَلَقْنَـٰهُ مِن قَبْلُ مِن نَّارِ ٱلسَّمُومِ

translations.text: As for the jinn, We created them earlier from smokeless fire.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waljanna khalaqnahumin qablu min nari assamoom
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَإِذْ قَالَ رَبُّكَ لِلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةِ إِنِّى خَـٰلِقٌۢ بَشَرًا مِّن صَلْصَـٰلٍ مِّنْ حَمَإٍ مَّسْنُونٍ

translations.text: ˹Remember, O  Prophet˺ when your Lord said to the angels, “I am going to create a human being from sounding clay moulded from black mud.<sup foot_note=76830>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wa-ith qala rabbuka lilmala-ikatiinnee khaliqun basharan min salsalin min hama-inmasnoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَإِذَا سَوَّيْتُهُۥ وَنَفَخْتُ فِيهِ مِن رُّوحِى فَقَعُوا۟ لَهُۥ سَـٰجِدِينَ

translations.text: So when I have fashioned him and had a spirit of My Own ˹creation˺ breathed into him, fall down in prostration to him.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fa-itha sawwaytuhu wanafakhtu feehimin roohee faqaAAoo lahu sajideen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَسَجَدَ ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ كُلُّهُمْ أَجْمَعُونَ

translations.text: So the angels prostrated all together—
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fasajada almala-ikatu kulluhumajmaAAoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِلَّآ إِبْلِيسَ أَبَىٰٓ أَن يَكُونَ مَعَ ٱلسَّـٰجِدِينَ

translations.text: but not Iblîs,<sup foot_note=76831>1</sup> who refused to prostrate with the others.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Illa ibleesa aba an yakoonamaAAa assajideen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ يَـٰٓإِبْلِيسُ مَا لَكَ أَلَّا تَكُونَ مَعَ ٱلسَّـٰجِدِينَ

translations.text: Allah asked, “O Iblîs! What is the matter with you that you did not join others in prostration?”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala ya ibleesu ma lakaalla takoona maAAa assajideen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ لَمْ أَكُن لِّأَسْجُدَ لِبَشَرٍ خَلَقْتَهُۥ مِن صَلْصَـٰلٍ مِّنْ حَمَإٍ مَّسْنُونٍ

translations.text: He replied, “It is not for me to prostrate to a human You created from sounding clay moulded from black mud.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala lam akun li-asjuda libasharinkhalaqtahu min salsalin min hama-in masnoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ فَٱخْرُجْ مِنْهَا فَإِنَّكَ رَجِيمٌ

translations.text: Allah commanded, “Then get out of Paradise, for you are truly cursed.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala fakhruj minhafa-innaka rajeem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَإِنَّ عَلَيْكَ ٱللَّعْنَةَ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ ٱلدِّينِ

translations.text: And surely upon you is condemnation until the Day of Judgment.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wa-inna AAalayka allaAAnata ila yawmiaddeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ رَبِّ فَأَنظِرْنِىٓ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ يُبْعَثُونَ

translations.text: Satan appealed, “My Lord! Then delay my end until the Day of their resurrection.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala rabbi faanthirneeila yawmi yubAAathoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ فَإِنَّكَ مِنَ ٱلْمُنظَرِينَ

translations.text: Allah said, “You will be delayed
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala fa-innaka mina almunthareen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ ٱلْوَقْتِ ٱلْمَعْلُومِ

translations.text: until the appointed Day.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ila yawmi alwaqti almaAAloom
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ رَبِّ بِمَآ أَغْوَيْتَنِى لَأُزَيِّنَنَّ لَهُمْ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَلَأُغْوِيَنَّهُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ

translations.text: Satan responded, “My Lord! For allowing me to stray I will surely tempt them on earth and mislead them all together,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala rabbi bima aghwaytaneelaozayyinanna lahum fee al-ardi walaoghwiyannahumajmaAAeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِلَّا عِبَادَكَ مِنْهُمُ ٱلْمُخْلَصِينَ

translations.text: except Your chosen servants among them.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Illa AAibadaka minhumualmukhlaseen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ هَـٰذَا صِرَٰطٌ عَلَىَّ مُسْتَقِيمٌ

translations.text: Allah said, “This is the Way, binding on Me:
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala hatha siratunAAalayya mustaqeem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّ عِبَادِى لَيْسَ لَكَ عَلَيْهِمْ سُلْطَـٰنٌ إِلَّا مَنِ ٱتَّبَعَكَ مِنَ ٱلْغَاوِينَ

translations.text: you will certainly have no authority over My servants, except the deviant who follow you,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna AAibadee laysa laka AAalayhimsultanun illa mani ittabaAAaka mina alghaween
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَإِنَّ جَهَنَّمَ لَمَوْعِدُهُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ

translation.text: (is) surely the promised place for them

translations.text: and surely Hell is their destined place, all together.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wa-inna jahannama lamawAAiduhum ajmaAAeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: لَهَا سَبْعَةُ أَبْوَٰبٍ لِّكُلِّ بَابٍ مِّنْهُمْ جُزْءٌ مَّقْسُومٌ

translations.text: It has seven gates, to each a group of them is designated.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Laha sabAAatu abwabin likullibabin minhum juz-on maqsoom
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ فِى جَنَّـٰتٍ وَعُيُونٍ

translations.text: Indeed, the righteous will be amid Gardens and springs.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna almuttaqeena fee jannatinwaAAuyoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ٱدْخُلُوهَا بِسَلَـٰمٍ ءَامِنِينَ

translations.text: ˹It will be said to them,˺ “Enter in peace and security.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Odkhulooha bisalamin amineen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَنَزَعْنَا مَا فِى صُدُورِهِم مِّنْ غِلٍّ إِخْوَٰنًا عَلَىٰ سُرُرٍ مُّتَقَـٰبِلِينَ

translations.text: We will remove whatever bitterness they had in their hearts.<sup foot_note=76832>1</sup> In a friendly manner, they will be on thrones, facing one another.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: WanazaAAna ma fee sudoorihimmin ghillin ikhwanan AAala sururin mutaqabileen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: لَا يَمَسُّهُمْ فِيهَا نَصَبٌ وَمَا هُم مِّنْهَا بِمُخْرَجِينَ

translations.text: No fatigue will touch them there, nor will they ever be asked to leave.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: La yamassuhum feeha nasabunwama hum minha bimukhrajeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ۞ نَبِّئْ عِبَادِىٓ أَنِّىٓ أَنَا ٱلْغَفُورُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ

translations.text: Inform My servants ˹O Prophet˺ that I am truly the All-Forgiving, Most Merciful,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Nabbi/ AAibadee annee anaalghafooru arraheem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَأَنَّ عَذَابِى هُوَ ٱلْعَذَابُ ٱلْأَلِيمُ

translations.text: and that My torment is indeed the most painful.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waanna AAathabee huwa alAAathabual-aleem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَنَبِّئْهُمْ عَن ضَيْفِ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ

translations.text: And inform them ˹O Prophet˺ about Abraham’s guests
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wanabbi/hum AAan dayfi ibraheem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِذْ دَخَلُوا۟ عَلَيْهِ فَقَالُوا۟ سَلَـٰمًا قَالَ إِنَّا مِنكُمْ وَجِلُونَ

translations.text: who entered upon him and greeted ˹him with˺, “Peace!” He ˹later˺ said, “Surely we are afraid of you.”<sup foot_note=76833>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ith dakhaloo AAalayhi faqaloosalaman qala inna minkum wajiloon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالُوا۟ لَا تَوْجَلْ إِنَّا نُبَشِّرُكَ بِغُلَـٰمٍ عَلِيمٍ

translations.text: They reassured ˹him˺, “Do not be afraid! Surely we give you good news of a knowledgeable son.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qaloo la tawjal innanubashshiruka bighulamin AAaleem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ أَبَشَّرْتُمُونِى عَلَىٰٓ أَن مَّسَّنِىَ ٱلْكِبَرُ فَبِمَ تُبَشِّرُونَ

translation.text: Do you give me glad tidings
Do you give me glad tidings

translations.text: He wondered, “Do you give me good news despite my old age? What unlikely news!”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala abashshartumoonee AAalaan massaniya alkibaru fabima tubashshiroon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالُوا۟ بَشَّرْنَـٰكَ بِٱلْحَقِّ فَلَا تَكُن مِّنَ ٱلْقَـٰنِطِينَ

translations.text: They responded, “We give you good news in all truth, so do not be one of those who despair.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qaloo bashsharnaka bilhaqqifala takun mina alqaniteen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ وَمَن يَقْنَطُ مِن رَّحْمَةِ رَبِّهِۦٓ إِلَّا ٱلضَّآلُّونَ

translations.text: He exclaimed, “Who would despair of the mercy of their Lord except the misguided?”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala waman yaqnatu min rahmatirabbihi illa addalloon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ فَمَا خَطْبُكُمْ أَيُّهَا ٱلْمُرْسَلُونَ

translations.text: He ˹then˺ added, “What is your mission, O  messenger-angels?”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala fama khatbukumayyuha almursaloon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّآ أُرْسِلْنَآ إِلَىٰ قَوْمٍ مُّجْرِمِينَ

translations.text: They replied, “We have actually been sent to a wicked people.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qaloo inna orsilna ilaqawmin mujrimeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِلَّآ ءَالَ لُوطٍ إِنَّا لَمُنَجُّوهُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ

translations.text: As for the family of Lot, we will certainly deliver them all,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Illa ala lootin innalamunajjoohum ajmaAAeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِلَّا ٱمْرَأَتَهُۥ قَدَّرْنَآ ۙ إِنَّهَا لَمِنَ ٱلْغَـٰبِرِينَ

translations.text: except his wife. We have determined that she will be one of the doomed.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Illa imraatahu qaddarna innahalamina alghabireen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَلَمَّا جَآءَ ءَالَ لُوطٍ ٱلْمُرْسَلُونَ

translations.text: So when the messenger-angels came to the family of Lot,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Falamma jaa ala lootinalmursaloon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ إِنَّكُمْ قَوْمٌ مُّنكَرُونَ

translations.text: he said, “You must be strangers!”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala innakum qawmun munkaroon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالُوا۟ بَلْ جِئْنَـٰكَ بِمَا كَانُوا۟ فِيهِ يَمْتَرُونَ

translations.text: They responded, “We have come to you with that ˹torment˺ which they have doubted.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qaloo bal ji/naka bimakanoo feehi yamtaroon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَأَتَيْنَـٰكَ بِٱلْحَقِّ وَإِنَّا لَصَـٰدِقُونَ

translation.text: And we have come to you

translations.text: We come to you with the truth, and we are certainly truthful.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waataynaka bilhaqqiwa-inna lasadiqoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَأَسْرِ بِأَهْلِكَ بِقِطْعٍ مِّنَ ٱلَّيْلِ وَٱتَّبِعْ أَدْبَـٰرَهُمْ وَلَا يَلْتَفِتْ مِنكُمْ أَحَدٌ وَٱمْضُوا۟ حَيْثُ تُؤْمَرُونَ

translations.text: So travel with your family in the dark of night, and follow ˹closely˺ behind them. Do not let any of you look back, and go where you are commanded.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Faasri bi-ahlika biqitAAin minaallayli wattabiAA adbarahum wala yaltafitminkum ahadun wamdoo haythutu/maroon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَقَضَيْنَآ إِلَيْهِ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلْأَمْرَ أَنَّ دَابِرَ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ مَقْطُوعٌ مُّصْبِحِينَ

translations.text: We revealed to him this decree: “Those ˹sinners˺ will be uprooted in the morning.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waqadayna ilayhi thalikaal-amra anna dabira haola-i maqtooAAunmusbiheen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَجَآءَ أَهْلُ ٱلْمَدِينَةِ يَسْتَبْشِرُونَ

translations.text: And there came the men of the city, rejoicing.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wajaa ahlu almadeenati yastabshiroon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ إِنَّ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ ضَيْفِى فَلَا تَفْضَحُونِ

translations.text: Lot pleaded, “Indeed, these are my guests, so do not embarrass me.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala inna haola-i dayfeefala tafdahoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَلَا تُخْزُونِ

translations.text: Fear Allah and do not humiliate me.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wattaqoo Allaha walatukhzoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالُوٓا۟ أَوَلَمْ نَنْهَكَ عَنِ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ

translations.text: They responded, “Have we not forbidden you from protecting anyone?”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qaloo awa lam nanhaka AAani alAAalameen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ بَنَاتِىٓ إِن كُنتُمْ فَـٰعِلِينَ

translations.text: He said, “O my people! Here are my daughters<sup foot_note=76834>1</sup> ˹so marry them˺ if you wish to do so.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala haola-i banateein kuntum faAAileen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: لَعَمْرُكَ إِنَّهُمْ لَفِى سَكْرَتِهِمْ يَعْمَهُونَ

translations.text: By your life ˹O Prophet˺,<sup foot_note=76835>1</sup> they certainly wandered blindly, intoxicated ˹by lust˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: LaAAamruka innahum lafee sakratihimyaAAmahoona
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَأَخَذَتْهُمُ ٱلصَّيْحَةُ مُشْرِقِينَ

translations.text: So the ˹mighty˺ blast overtook them at sunrise.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Faakhathat-humu assayhatumushriqeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَجَعَلْنَا عَـٰلِيَهَا سَافِلَهَا وَأَمْطَرْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ حِجَارَةً مِّن سِجِّيلٍ

translations.text: And We turned the cities ˹of Sodom and Gomorrah˺ upside down and rained upon them stones of baked clay.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: FajaAAalna AAaliyaha safilahawaamtarna AAalayhim hijaratan minsijjeel
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَـٰتٍ لِّلْمُتَوَسِّمِينَ

translations.text: Surely in this are signs for those who contemplate.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna fee thalika laayatinlilmutawassimeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَإِنَّهَا لَبِسَبِيلٍ مُّقِيمٍ

translations.text: Their ruins still lie along a known route.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wa-innaha labisabeelin muqeem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَةً لِّلْمُؤْمِنِينَ

translations.text: Surely in this is a sign for those who believe.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna fee thalika laayatanlilmu/mineen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَإِن كَانَ أَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلْأَيْكَةِ لَظَـٰلِمِينَ

translations.text: And the residents of the Forest were truly wrongdoers,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wa-in kana as-habual-aykati lathalimeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَٱنتَقَمْنَا مِنْهُمْ وَإِنَّهُمَا لَبِإِمَامٍ مُّبِينٍ

translations.text: so We inflicted punishment upon them. The ruins of both nations still lie on a well-known road.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fantaqamna minhum wa-innahumalabi-imamin mubeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَقَدْ كَذَّبَ أَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلْحِجْرِ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ

translations.text: Indeed, the residents of the Stone Valley also denied the messengers.<sup foot_note=76836>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walaqad kaththaba as-habualhijri almursaleen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَءَاتَيْنَـٰهُمْ ءَايَـٰتِنَا فَكَانُوا۟ عَنْهَا مُعْرِضِينَ

translations.text: We gave them Our signs, but they turned away from them.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waataynahum ayatinafakanoo AAanha muAArideen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَكَانُوا۟ يَنْحِتُونَ مِنَ ٱلْجِبَالِ بُيُوتًا ءَامِنِينَ

translations.text: They carved their homes in the mountains, feeling secure.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wakanoo yanhitoona mina aljibalibuyootan amineen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَأَخَذَتْهُمُ ٱلصَّيْحَةُ مُصْبِحِينَ

translations.text: But the ˹mighty˺ blast overtook them in the morning,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Faakhathat-humu assayhatumusbiheen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَمَآ أَغْنَىٰ عَنْهُم مَّا كَانُوا۟ يَكْسِبُونَ

translations.text: and all they achieved was of no help to them.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fama aghna AAanhum ma kanooyaksiboon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَمَا خَلَقْنَا ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَآ إِلَّا بِٱلْحَقِّ ۗ وَإِنَّ ٱلسَّاعَةَ لَـَٔاتِيَةٌ ۖ فَٱصْفَحِ ٱلصَّفْحَ ٱلْجَمِيلَ

translations.text: We have not created the heavens and the earth and everything in between except for a purpose. And the Hour is certain to come, so forgive graciously.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wama khalaqna assamawatiwal-arda wama baynahuma illabilhaqqi wa-inna assaAAata laatiyatunfasfahi assafhaaljameel
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ ٱلْخَلَّـٰقُ ٱلْعَلِيمُ

translations.text: Surely your Lord is the Master Creator, All-Knowing.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna rabbaka huwa alkhallaqualAAaleem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَقَدْ ءَاتَيْنَـٰكَ سَبْعًا مِّنَ ٱلْمَثَانِى وَٱلْقُرْءَانَ ٱلْعَظِيمَ

translations.text: We have certainly granted you the seven often-repeated verses<sup foot_note=76837>1</sup> and the great Quran.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walaqad ataynaka sabAAan minaalmathanee walqur-ana alAAatheem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: لَا تَمُدَّنَّ عَيْنَيْكَ إِلَىٰ مَا مَتَّعْنَا بِهِۦٓ أَزْوَٰجًا مِّنْهُمْ وَلَا تَحْزَنْ عَلَيْهِمْ وَٱخْفِضْ جَنَاحَكَ لِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ

translations.text: Do not let your eyes crave the ˹fleeting˺ pleasures We have provided for some of the disbelievers, nor grieve for them. And be gracious to the believers.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: La tamuddanna AAaynayka ila mamattaAAna bihi azwajan minhum wala tahzanAAalayhim wakhfid janahaka lilmu/mineen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَقُلْ إِنِّىٓ أَنَا ٱلنَّذِيرُ ٱلْمُبِينُ

translations.text: And say, “I am truly sent with a clear warning”—
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waqul innee ana annatheerualmubeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: كَمَآ أَنزَلْنَا عَلَى ٱلْمُقْتَسِمِينَ

translations.text: ˹a warning˺ similar to what We sent to those who divided ˹the Scriptures˺,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Kama anzalna AAalaalmuqtasimeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ٱلَّذِينَ جَعَلُوا۟ ٱلْقُرْءَانَ عِضِينَ

translations.text: who ˹now˺ accept parts of the Quran, rejecting others.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Allatheena jaAAaloo alqur-anaAAideen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَوَرَبِّكَ لَنَسْـَٔلَنَّهُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ

translations.text: So by your Lord! We will certainly question them all
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fawarabbika lanas-alannahum ajmaAAeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: عَمَّا كَانُوا۟ يَعْمَلُونَ

translations.text: about what they used to do.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: AAamma kanoo yaAAmaloon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَٱصْدَعْ بِمَا تُؤْمَرُ وَأَعْرِضْ عَنِ ٱلْمُشْرِكِينَ

translations.text: So proclaim what you have been commanded, and turn away from the polytheists.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: FasdaAA bima tu/maruwaaAArid AAani almushrikeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّا كَفَيْنَـٰكَ ٱلْمُسْتَهْزِءِينَ

translations.text: Surely We will be sufficient for you against the mockers,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna kafaynaka almustahzi-een
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ٱلَّذِينَ يَجْعَلُونَ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَـٰهًا ءَاخَرَ ۚ فَسَوْفَ يَعْلَمُونَ

translations.text: who set up ˹other˺ gods with Allah. They will soon come to know.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Allatheena yajAAaloona maAAa Allahiilahan akhara fasawfa yaAAlamoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَقَدْ نَعْلَمُ أَنَّكَ يَضِيقُ صَدْرُكَ بِمَا يَقُولُونَ

translations.text: We certainly know that your heart is truly distressed by what they say.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walaqad naAAlamu annaka yadeequ sadrukabima yaqooloon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ وَكُن مِّنَ ٱلسَّـٰجِدِينَ

translations.text: So glorify the praises of your Lord and be one of those who ˹always˺ pray,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fasabbih bihamdi rabbika wakunmina assajideen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱعْبُدْ رَبَّكَ حَتَّىٰ يَأْتِيَكَ ٱلْيَقِينُ

translations.text: and worship your Lord until the inevitable<sup foot_note=76838>1</sup> comes your way.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: WaAAbud rabbaka hattaya/tiyaka alyaqeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration
